name: Slime Survival (OwlTreeStudios)
description:
Slime Survival

The slimes are out to get you, and you must defend yourself and survive as long as possible. Run and dash through slimes to obliterate them, before they can snuff out your flame!!

Made in 5 days for VimJam 3!

Controls

Arrow Keys or WASD to move

Space to Dash

Fullscreen Recommended
